pageContext.claim: “We've brought in hundreds of -- many hundreds of millions of dollars from offshore because of the tax plan. And that all went to creating -- Apple, as an example -- I was with them -- they're going to be spending $350 billion on building new facilities in the United States, which is something, as you know, from a long a time ago. I've been saying it from the beginning. I want Apple to build their plants here. They're going to spend $350 billion.”
pageContext.analysis: Apple announced a five-year investment plan in January that adds up to nearly $350 billion. Chief executive Tim Cook told ABC News that “there are large parts of this that are a result of the tax reform, and there’s large parts of this that we would have done in any situation.”
